articles.description: The iQoo Neo 6 is priced at Rs. 29,999 for the 8GB + 128GB storage model and Rs 33,999 for the higher end 12GB + 256GB variant.

articles.title: Sonos launches new Ray soundbar in India, price set at Rs 37,999 - India Today
articles.description: Sonos is a premium audio brand that forayed into the Indian audio market in July last year with a bunch of products including Sonos Five, Sonos Move and Sonos Arc.
articles.content: Sonos has launched a new audio product in India. Expanding its soundbar portfolio, Sonos has added a new compact soundbar to the list called the Ray soundbar. Sonos is a premium audio brand that fora… [+2144 chars]
